value: As a Student, I want a way to see and show what classes I have attended
Students want to be able to see the classes they have attended with us and access certificates of completion.

Any student who has filled out a course evaluation should be able to go to http://www.quicklearn.com/transcript and input the same email they filled out the evaluation with and see all of the classes they attended previously as well as be able to download a certificate of completion.
